results.title: Effect of metformin on irinotecan-induced cell cycle arrest in colorectal cancer cell lines HCT116 and SW480
results.text_hl: ...@<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ is widely used for the treatment of @DISEASE_Diabetes_Mellitus_Type_2 @DISEASE_MESH:D003924 @@@type 2 diabetes mellitus@@@ and found to have a crucial rule in the induction of apoptosis in several @DISEASE_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D009369 @@@cancer@@@ types including @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Pancreatic_Ductal @DISEASE_MESH:D021441 @@@pancreatic cell carcinoma@@@, @DISEASE_Carcinoma_Ovarian_Epithelial @DISEASE_MESH:D000077216 @@@epithelial ovarian cancer@@@, @DISEASE_Breast_Neoplasms @DISEASE_MESH:D001943 @@@breast cancer@@@, and @<m>DISEASE_Carcinoma_Renal_Cell</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002292 @@@renal cell carcinoma@@@.
